question: Is capmatinib effective for glioblastoma?
ideal_answer: No. Combination of capmatinib buparlisib resulted in no clear activity in patients with recurrent PTEN-deficient glioblastoma.

snippets.text: CONCLUSION: The combination of INC280/buparlisib resulted in no clear activity in patients with recurrent PTEN-deficient glioblastoma.
